bossDialog: (A bizarre and unintelligible voice rings around the room as a pink flame ignites in the air before you, staring you down menacingly before attacking!)
(The treasure hoard seems to be haunted by a malevolent entity. It manifests a sinister leer as you approach, as if daring you to attack it. You promptly oblige.)
(You feel an intense heat on the back of your neck, and turn around just in time to avoid a Wisp trying to scorch you! Your creatures intercept it and attack!)

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures have a 5% chance to resist effects that cause them to fall to the bottom of the {TIMELINE}.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures have a 5% chance to resist effects that cause them to fall to the bottom of the {TIMELINE}.
cardBonuses.6: Your creatures have a 5% chance to resist effects that cause them to fall to the bottom of the {TIMELINE}.

master.dialog: Wisps are some of the most powerful creatures in Rodia, but admittedly, they have one glaring weakness: they can be disrupted very, very easily. Even so, if you don't manage to interrupt my Wisps in time, they'll make quick work of your creatures. Let me show you!
master.name: Verdun

name: Wisp
